articles.description: The Pakistan star has claimed many fans told him they likes the “previous team better,” adding that they have stopped watching matches since he was dropped.
articles.content: The Pakistan cricket team has produced impressive performances of late, especially in the limited-overs formats. The side had defeated Australia 2-1 in a three-match ODI series in March, and also reg… [+1889 chars]

articles.title: 'What do you do that I don't do?': Nathan Lyon reveals SL legend's blunt reply - Hindustan Times
articles.description: It was in 2011 that a young Nathan Lyon made his debut and removed batting icon Kumar Sangakkara with his first ball in Test cricket.
articles.content: Pitches in Sri Lanka turn from day one and Australia, who tour the island nation for a two-match Test series, will rely heavily on their premier spinner Nathan Lyon. The Pat Cummins-led side into the… [+2260 chars]
